start.reply: :wave: Hi {{name}}! I'm your personal monitor bot. My mission is to track :mag: a list of websites and notify :speech_balloon: status changes.

error.database: You have to set the environment variable DATABASE_URL with the URL of a PostgreSQL database
error.target: You have to set the environment variable TELEGRAM_TO with the ID of the target chat
error.token: You have to set the environment variable TELEGRAM_TOKEN with the value from @BotFather

error.private: :no_entry: Sorry, I am a private bot and I am not authorized to chat with you.

url.empty: You need to provide an URL or a list of URLs
url.not-added: {{{url}}} could not be added to the track list
url.not-found: {{{url}}} not found in the tracking list
url.not-removed: {{{url}}} not removed from the tracking list

status.error: {{{url}}} is responding, but the status code is {{statusCode}} :worried:
